Haqeem Luqman pe 3 Ilmi Points !!
Ayat 12, “Aur hum ney yaqeenan luqman ko hikmat di thi kay…”
Ayat 13, “Aur jab kay luqman ney waaz kehtay huyey apnay larkay…”
Ayat 14, “Hum ney insan ko uss kay maa baap kay mutalliq…”
Ayat 15, “Aur agar woh dono tujh per iss baat ka dabao…”
Ayat 16, “Piayaray betay agar koi cheez raaee kay danay kay barabar…”
Ayat 17, “Aey meray piyaray betay! Tu namaz qaeem rakhna achay kaamo…”
Ayat 18, “Logon kay samney apnay gaal na phula aur zamin per…”
Ayat 19, “Apni raftar mein miyana rawi ikhtiyar ker aur apni awaz…”
Conclusion !!
Hayat-un-Nabi صلى الله عليه وآله وسلم ka Awaam mei Aqeeda !! Awaam Aur Ulema ka Aqeeda Bataei !!
